channel.title: How to make the dbow shoot from far away
channel.description: my dbow in my game needs to get right next to the npc to att it... how do you fix it to shoot far away?

item.title: How to make the dbow shoot from far away
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

lol runerking… GTFO of my server! (jk)

i found something:

if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)

what if i just added

|| playerEquipement[playerWeapon] == 15156

???

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the dbow shoot from far away
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Search Magic bow id (861), and place it above that code when you find it, that’s what I did with my dark bow, and it works.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the dbow shoot from far away
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Make an exception for that particular weapon in gooddistance, or use

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #####) { useBow = true; }
